entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
